noble_transformed.speaker: Narrator
noble_transformed.text: The door opens, and you barely recognize the figure that enters. The Masked Noble stands tall, but for the first time, they are not wearing their mask.

noble_revealed.speaker: The Noble
noble_revealed.text: *They smile openly, their full face visible for the first time* I know. It's strange, isn't it? After all this time hiding, here I am. Just me.

noble_announcement_final.speaker: The Noble
noble_announcement_final.text: I returned home. Addressed the council. Told them I would accept my duties... but on my terms. Do you know what they said?

noble_outcome.speaker: The Noble
noble_outcome.text: *They laugh* They were relieved! Not because I returned, but because I finally spoke as a person, not a portrait. They'd been waiting for me to find my voice.

noble_changes.speaker: The Noble
noble_changes.text: I've already begun changes. Royal kitchens are now required to source from local farms. Court sessions include common petitioners. Small steps, but real ones.

noble_gratitude.speaker: The Noble
noble_gratitude.text: *They take your hands* None of it would have happened without you. Without this place. You showed me that authenticity isn't weakness - it's the truest strength.

noble_gift_final.speaker: The Noble
noble_gift_final.text: *They produce a royal purse and an elegant recipe scroll* For you. A gift of gold and a honey glazed game recipe from the royal hunt. And a promise - Dragon Haven will forever have the crown's protection.

noble_farewell.speaker: The Noble
noble_farewell.text: I can't visit as often now, but know this: whenever I feel the mask trying to grow back, I'll think of this cafe. Of you. Of who I am beneath the crown.

noble_final.speaker: Narrator
noble_final.text: The noble, no longer masked, embraces you briefly before departing. They leave behind not just gifts, but the proof that authenticity can transform even the highest of stations.
